title: The Seinfeld Reunion - A Conversation with Colin
description:
Rumors are swirling about a Seinfeld Reunion. Here's what it should be.

Today's topic was submitted by @_Irish95. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

transcript_chunks.text: Hey , I don't think Seinfeld gracefully bowed out. I think that last episode sucks. What's up, everybody? Welcome to A Conversation With Colin. I'm Greg, and this is my roommate, Colin. Now, sometimes Colin says crazy stuff, so every Tuesday and Thursday, I reach to my random topic pile, pull it out, toss it at him, and we talk it out for your amusement. Fastest intro ever. If you like that, like the video, subscribe to us on YouTube, share us with your friends. Colin, are you ready? Yes. Today's topic of conversation is rumors of a new Seinfeld reunion show.
